title: Triple Town (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here triple town. Again plz help seed and game info below.
Hope you guys enjoy :).
 <a href="
http://www.gog.com/game/triple_town" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.gog.com/game/triple_town</a>


Winner of multiple awards for best indie game and best social game in 2011, now available for download on Mac and PC.
Includes the Capital City metagame not found in the mobile version of this game. Apply your Triple Town skills to an endless, expandable capital!
Play in full screen and high resolution, exclusive to this version of the game.


Triple Town is an award-winning original puzzle game in which you try to grow the greatest possible city. The larger the city you build, the more points you score. You build your city by matching three or more game-pieces: combine three grasses to make a bush, three bushes to make a tree... until you've filled the board with houses, cathedrals and castles. Along the way, you'll have to outwit giant bears who will try to block your progress. 

How large can you grow your dream city before the board fills and the game ends? 

This is the ultimate hardcore version of Triple Town. There are no in-app purchases of any kind in the game. There is no DLC. When you buy the
